short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download high-resolution images from Home Depot.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description
Buddy's Home Depot Image Downloader is the ultimate tool for effortlessly downloading high-resolution images from Home Depot's website. Whether you're a contractor, designer, or DIY enthusiast, this extension makes it incredibly easy to collect and save images for your projects and presentations.

Features
High-Resolution Downloads: Automatically fetch and download the highest quality images available from Home Depot.
Easy Preview: View a clean and organized grid of all available images right in the extension popup.
Single Click Downloads: Download individual images quickly with a single click on the download icon.
Bulk Download: Save time by downloading all images at once into a convenient ZIP file.
User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a sleek and intuitive interface that makes image management a breeze.
Donation Support: Keep this project free by donating through Venmo or PayPal, directly from the extension.

How to Use
Install the Extension: Add Buddy's Home Depot Image Downloader to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.
Navigate to a Product Page: Go to any product page on Home Depot's website.
Open the Extension: Click on the Buddy's Home Depot Image Downloader icon in your Chrome toolbar.
Preview and Download: Browse through the images in the popup, click the download icon on individual images, or use the "Download All" button to save all images in a ZIP file.
